channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dylan's Playtime Adventures
channel.desc: Airport Worker. Dylan the airport worker wants to help travellers catch their flights. So when a suitcase rolls away, he needs to find it and bring it back before the plane takes off.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Twirlywoos
channel.desc: Twirling. Stop-motion preschool series. The Twirlywoos learn about twirling when they visit an ice rink. The Box brings them a grass skirt which takes its wearer for a twirl.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Animals. Mr Tumble has lots of horsey fun, while Justin and his friends spend the day with ponies.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Again Again. Preschool fun from Teletubbyland. The Teletubbies can't get enough of the Tubby Custard Ride so they ask to go on it again and again.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Baby Club
channel.desc: Scarf. Giovanna and Baby Bear invite babies and their grown-ups to explore scarves through discovery, play, song and story.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: My First
channel.desc: Canal Cruise. Join Ivy as she goes on a relaxing canal cruise for the first time.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Kiri and Lou
channel.desc: How Are You? The two friends celebrate the joys of greeting.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie & Triggs
channel.desc: Disco Train. Maddie and Triggs take a magical journey through the sky on Granny's disco train.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: The Magic Xylophone. Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, which has the power to freeze Dad.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Shadow Badge. Animated preschool series. There's been a power cut and the Squirrels can't see anything. Thank goodness Duggee has got his torch.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: I Can Do It, You Can Too
channel.desc: Grapevine Dance and Tag Rugby. Lemmie learns to do the grapevine dance with coach Max at the theatre, and Ava plays tag rugby with coach Sam.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Let's Go for a Walk
channel.desc: Cows and Apples Walk. Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers moo with the cows and find a tractor and a quad bike, all on a walk to pick apples.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family
channel.desc: Meet Audrey's Family. Audrey makes a pizza for her family, followed by a fun board game. But who will win.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Cook Little Cook
channel.desc: The Pipe-Playing Piper. Children's cookery series. Small has a new recorder but is having trouble learning how to play it. Jen and Small cook the Pied Piper something tasty and tuneful.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Biff and Chip
channel.desc: Floppy's Bath. After Chip, Wilf and Wilma sniff out a strange stink in the kitchen, they quickly track the big whiff to Floppy. But giving Floppy a bath is not as easy as they thought.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: What's in Your Bag?
channel.desc: Chef. Chef Akwasi introduces us to his tapoli grinder. It is used with the asanka bowl to grind together ingredients that make delicious meals.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild
channel.desc: Brown Bear and Hazel Dormouse. Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal a surprising connection between them in the wild. This time, it's brown bears and a hazel dormouse.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Grace's Amazing Machines
channel.desc: Rail Machines. Series for young children that celebrates many different kinds of amazing machines. In this episode, Grace shows off three incredible machines that run on rails.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yakka Dee!
channel.desc: Spider. Dee encourages a friend to say 'spider', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a black spider, a spooky one and even a tap-dancing spider.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Numberblocks
channel.desc: Loop the Loop. Super rectangle Eighteen shows the others how to ride the rays on the super-duper looper. Learn about numbers that can make rectangle shapes with the Numberblocks.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Alphablocks
channel.desc: Tightrope. Educational fun. A simple skipping game turns into a night at the circus as I, G and H find themselves high up on a tightrope.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Wonderblocks
channel.desc: Rainy Day Bears. Go and Stop are visiting the Three Bears for some puddle splashing. The bears are excited to play in the rain, but they all have very different ideas about how to get ready.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: A Colourful Journey. The Colourblocks travel through Colourland on an airship, picking up new and old friends along the way.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The First Aid Badge. Animated preschool series. When Tag hurts his knee, Duggee patches him up with help from the Squirrels.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yukee
channel.desc: Slime Sisters. The sensational singing snail sisters take a wrong direction and end up in the garden.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Under the Sea. Fishy fun with Justin and his friends as they visit an aquarium and meet a diver. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble in on the hunt for some underwater treasure.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Say Hello. Preschool series. Tinky Winky and Laa-Laa are in Home Dome when the Tubby Phone rings. It is Dipsy and Po calling from the Tubby Mobile to say hello.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Tidbit's Thirsty Day. When Tidbit gets dehydrated, Vida helps him to play and hydrate at the same time.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Joist Hoist. Swoppiton Bridge is falling down - can Mojo and Bo help Nori fix it in time.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle's Homework. Waffle's forgotten to do his homework, and Mr Nolan decides if he can continue as a pupil.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie's Do You Know?
channel.desc: Bike Chain and Tennis Ball. Maddie uses a special camera to find out how the chain on a bicycle works and visits a factory to see how rubber is made into tennis balls.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: The Vampire Squid. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his explorers. Peso must gather all his courage when he travels deep down to the very bottom of the ocean.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Sunny's Vet Training. Sunny Mouse joins Vida for a day of vet training, but he's so small that most jobs are too big. until the perfect one presents itself.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club
channel.desc: Frog Song. It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of the Journal's End. Animated series. When Flopsy and Mopsy borrow Peter's journal, Peter has to save them from Old Brown - but will he lose his journal in the process.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
channel.desc: Leptictidium and Fig. Adventure series. Andy searches for the tiny leptictidium, a furry mammal that used to bounce around the forests of Europe fifty million years ago.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Swophenge. Preston's standing stones aren't standing. Can Mojo's crane top take care of it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Surprise. Bluey and Bingo want Dad to play two different games, so Dad plays both at the same time.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Burger Shop. It's time for Bluey and Bingo to get out of the bath, but Dad gets roped into a game.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Winter Wonderland. Evil Pea chases the Veggies with a giant snowball after covering the supermarket in ice.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: The Problem Plant. Big Lizard steals Dad's special plant from the ship. and just in time.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dog Squad
channel.desc: Mission: Last Minute Visitor. Disability assistance dog Tinks and her owner Charli have a long list of chores to do, all in time for Annabel, their last minute visitor.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family Fun Shorts
channel.desc: Amanpreet Paints a Portrait. Amanpreet gets arty and has a go at painting Mum's portrait.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle's Sort of Birthday. Preschool comedy drama series. It's Waffle's birthday and Mr Willow throws a huge party for him. But Ruby's dog, Jelly, leads the Wonder Dog astray.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: A Day Out. Papa keeps the family entertained on a fun day out.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Discover Somewhere New. On a trip to the library, Gran Gran helps JoJo discover new places they've not seen before.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Mr Onion's Storybook. Mr Onion looks inside a book and decides to tell a story to his best friend Dibillo.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Radio Wol. The Iron Chicken's radio breaks down, so she and the Wols create their own radio station.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Makka Pakka's Trumpet Makes a Funny Noise. Series for young children about a magical place. Igglepiggle and Upsy Daisy visit Makka Pakka and discover a stone stuck in his trumpet.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Jenny Agutter - Follow the Track, All the Way Back. All aboard for a Bedtime Story with Jenny Agutter about a little train who goes on his first big adventure all by himself.
